articles.title: The candlemaker cousins who turned their passion hobby for scented candles into a budding business - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: In this week's Creative Capital, we meet multicultural cousins Sarah Wee and Cheyenne Naidu, who started candle company Nitwick as a way to bond while indulging their love for creativity.
articles.content:
HOW HARD IS IT TO LEARN CANDLE MAKING?
Sarah: Essentially, making a candle in itself is not easy but its not hard either. Whats difficult is understanding fragrances; learning how to blend and balan… [+2784 chars]
